Headline: #39 Pershing Temporary Reroute near Pershing/Wells
ShortDescription: 39 Pershing buses temp. rerouted EB: 39th, Wallace, Root, Princeton and 39th; Wb: 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#39 Pershing buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 39th and Wells due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 39th, Wallace, Root and Princeton and 39th.

Westbound buses will operate via 39th, Princeton, Root, Wallace and 39th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays, following an earlier medical emergency near Sheridan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays, following an earlier medical emergency near Sheridan.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
